page.shortlink: api client api a5 button setdisabled method

argument.name: disabled
argument.description: The disabled state of the button(s).

argument.name: buttons
argument.description: The specific BUTTON elements to disable/enable. If none are passed in then all buttons bound to the A5.Button control will be disabled/enabled.

page.description: Disable/enable some or all of the BUTTON elements bound to the A5.Button control.
